body:
If you have multiple files in the folder, it makes the listing hard to read as it's grouped by the fake folder.

Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell
touch a\b.txt
dir
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

```none
    Directory: /Users/steve/test

Mode                LastWriteTime         Length Name                                                                                           
----                -------------         ------ ----                                                                                           
------         10/21/17   4:46 PM              0 a\b.txt
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```none
    Directory: /Users/steve/test/a


Mode                LastWriteTime         Length Name                                                                                           
----                -------------         ------ ----                                                                                           
------         10/21/17   4:46 PM              0 a\b.txt
```

title: If a filename contains a backslash, the default format for file/folders incorrectly renders it as a folder
